senses.sense_definition: The rhythmic sound produced by hitting a drum.

examples.text: The dancers moved energetically in time to the steady <w>drumbeat</w>.
We could hear the distant <w>drumbeat</w> of the marching band approaching the square.

senses.sense_definition: A loud, repetitive, and rhythmic sound that resembles the beating of a drum.

examples.text: She fell asleep listening to the soothing <w>drumbeat</w> of rain on the roof.
The doctor listened carefully to the rapid <w>drumbeat</w> of the patient's heart.

senses.sense_definition: A persistent and continuous series of events, demands, or comments that creates pressure or drives a situation forward.

examples.text: The <w>drumbeat</w> of war grew louder as diplomatic talks failed to produce a solution.
He tried to ignore the constant <w>drumbeat</w> of criticism coming from the media.
